column3: If you're wondering what this game is all about...
In this game you have to fight me.
But don't be thinking It's gonna be easy.
All my attacks are gonna be so unbalanced!
I'll make sure you enjoy the pain!
I'll also act like I'm pissed at you!
All just so you can get "immersed" in the game!
You're gonna die right where you're standing.
I'll keep acting like that for the sake of your "immersion".
